title: New: Broods – Heartlines
content:
NZ’s finest four team up for this new track.

Broods (Caleb & Georgia Nott), Lorde and Joel Little join forces for Heartlines, lifted from the forthcoming Broods record, Conscious. Bold, anthemic pop – it’s not a huge departure from their debut LP, but hey, why change a winning formula?

Like this? Follow our On Repeat Playlist for a handpicked selection of the very best in new music; updated weekly.
author: 5e9b68b27a1236eccfeb1d27
